product_title: JS39P 4K Drone with 9-Inch Display Remote

detail.name: JS39P 4K Drone with 9-Inch Display Remote

details.description_text: It's a best product...!DescriptionJS39P 4K Brushless Gimbal Camera Drone 9-Inch Display RemoteThe JS39P Intelligent Aerial Drone is designed to bring your aerial adventures to new heights with cutting-edge features and a sleek design. Equipped with a 9-inch display remote control, this drone allows you to experience the thrill of flying like never before.Key Features:Dual 4K Cameras with 90° Adjustable Angles: Capture breathtaking aerial photos and videos from various angles with the dual 4K cameras. You can adjust the cameras within 90° to get the perfect shot, ensuring that every moment is captured in high-definition detail.Real-time FPV (First-Person View) Transmission: With advanced FPV technology, enjoy live footage straight to your smartphone through the app. This feature brings a new level of immersion as you explore beautiful landscapes from above.Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance Technology: Fly with confidence, thanks to the drone’s 360° obstacle avoidance system. It automatically detects and avoids obstacles, ensuring a safe and smooth flight experience. Whether you’re a beginner or experienced flyer, this feature provides peace of mind.VR 3D Experience: The JS39P offers a unique 3D VR experience when connected to your phone, allowing you to immerse yourself in the flight like never before. Combine this with the bright LED lights and enjoy spectacular night flights with added visual effects.Multiple Flight Modes and Stunt Functions: From 360° flips to trajectory flight paths, this drone offers exciting modes that make flying even more fun. Whether you’re performing stunts or drawing flight paths on your phone, the JS39P is designed to bring creativity to the skies.Beginner-Friendly Operation: Designed with ease of use in mind, the JS39P offers one-key takeoff and landing, altitude hold, speed adjustment, and headless mode. It’s perfect for beginners and allows for stable hovering and easy control, even for first-time pilots.Long Battery Life: The JS39P is powered by a 3.7V 2500mAh dual Li-Po battery, providing up to 20-25 minutes of flight time on a single charge. Whether you’re exploring vast landscapes or capturing breathtaking views, this drone will keep you flying longer.Durable Design: Built with high-quality materials, including plastic, metal, and advanced electronics, the JS39P is built to last. Its rugged construction ensures that your drone will withstand numerous adventures, both indoors and outdoors.

This drone is packed with features that make it an ideal choice for both indoor and outdoor flying adventures. Equipped with a 6-axis gyroscope and air pressure constant control, this drone is easy to control and maintain a stable flight path in any condition. details.description_text: High quality product...!DescriptionJ18P 4K Brushless Gimbal Camera Drone 9-Inch Display RemoteThe J18P Intelligent Aerial Drone is designed to bring your aerial adventures to new heights with cutting-edge features and a sleek design. Equipped with a 9-inch display remote control, this drone allows you to experience the thrill of flying like never before.Key Features:Dual 4K Cameras with 90° Adjustable Angles: Capture breathtaking aerial photos and videos from various angles with the dual 4K cameras. You can adjust the cameras within 90° to get the perfect shot, ensuring that every moment is captured in high-definition detail.Real-time FPV (First-Person View) Transmission: With advanced FPV technology, enjoy live footage straight to your smartphone through the app. This feature brings a new level of immersion as you explore beautiful landscapes from above.Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance Technology: Fly with confidence, thanks to the drone’s 360° obstacle avoidance system. It automatically detects and avoids obstacles, ensuring a safe and smooth flight experience. Whether you’re a beginner or experienced flyer, this feature provides peace of mind.VR 3D Experience: The J19P offers a unique 3D VR experience when connected to your phone, allowing you to immerse yourself in the flight like never before. Combine this with the bright LED lights and enjoy spectacular night flights with added visual effects.Multiple Flight Modes and Stunt Functions: From 360° flips to trajectory flight paths, this drone offers exciting modes that make flying even more fun. Whether you’re performing stunts or drawing flight paths on your phone, the J18P is designed to bring creativity to the skies.Beginner-Friendly Operation: Designed with ease of use in mind, the J18P offers one-key takeoff and landing, altitude hold, speed adjustment, and headless mode. It’s perfect for beginners and allows for stable hovering and easy control, even for first-time pilots.Long Battery Life: The J19P is powered by a 3.7V 2500mAh dual Li-Po battery, providing up to 20-25 minutes of flight time on a single charge. Whether you’re exploring vast landscapes or capturing breathtaking views, this drone will keep you flying longer.Durable Design: Built with high-quality materials, including plastic, metal, and advanced electronics, the J19P is built to last. Its rugged construction ensures that your drone will withstand numerous adventures, both indoors and outdoors.

product_title: M3 Max EAC Dual Camera Drone with Brushless Motors: Stable Flight & Obstacle Avoidance for Beginners

detail.name: M3 Max EAC Dual Camera Drone with Brushless Motors: Stable Flight & Obstacle Avoidance for Beginners

details.description_text: Take to the skies with confidence and capture stunning aerial photos and videos using the M3 Max EAC Dual Camera Drone! This user-friendly drone is perfect for beginner pilots who want to experience the thrill of flight without the hassle of complicated controls. Effortless Flight with Brushless Motors: The M3 Max EAC boasts advanced brushless motors that deliver smooth, powerful flight. Brushless motors offer several advantages over traditional brushed motors, including: Increased Efficiency: Brushless motors convert more electrical energy into mechanical power, resulting in longer flight times and improved battery life. Reduced Noise: Brushless motors operate much quieter than brushed motors, making your flying experience more enjoyable and less disruptive. Enhanced Durability: Brushless motors require less maintenance and have a longer lifespan compared to brushed motors. Capture Stunning Aerial Photography & Videos: The M3 Max EAC features a dual camera system, allowing you to capture breathtaking aerial photos and videos from different perspectives. This is perfect for capturing wider landscapes or adding a unique dimension to your footage. Safety & Stability Features for Peace of Mind: The M3 Max EAC prioritizes safety and stability for a stress-free flying experience: Obstacle Avoidance Mode: This innovative feature uses sensors to detect obstacles in the drone's path, automatically adjusting its course to avoid collisions. This is a fantastic feature for new pilots who are still learning to navigate their drone. Superb Stability: The M3 Max EAC is designed for exceptional stability, making it easier to capture clear photos and videos, even for beginners. App Control for Enhanced Functionality: Take control of your flight experience with the included app. The app offers a variety of features, including: Real-Time FPV (First-Person View): See the world from the drone's perspective through the live video feed displayed on your smartphone or tablet. Intuitive Flight Controls: The app provides user-friendly controls for easy navigation and maneuvering of your drone. Advanced Features: Unlock additional features such as waypoint navigation, stunt mode, and more (availability may vary depending on the app).

details.description_text: Embark on an exciting journey into the world of aerial photography and exploration with the F190 Mini RC Drone. This feature-packed quadcopter is designed to provide you with an immersive flying experience and the ability to capture breathtaking aerial shots.High-Quality 4K Dual Camera: Equipped with a 4K HD dual camera system, this drone lets you capture stunning photos and videos from the sky. You can even switch between cameras for different angles and perspectives, ensuring you get the perfect shot every time.Foldable and Portable: The F190 Mini features foldable arms, making it incredibly compact and easy to carry. Whether you're traveling or heading to your favorite outdoor spot, this drone is ready to go wherever adventure takes you.Stable Flight: Thanks to its altitude hold mode, the drone maintains a stable altitude, allowing for smoother flight and better photo and video quality. Even beginners can fly with confidence.Intuitive Controls: With features like one-key takeoff, landing, and return, as well as headless mode, flying the F190 Mini is a breeze. You'll spend less time worrying about controls and more time enjoying your flights.Real-Time FPV: Connect your smartphone to the drone via WiFi and experience real-time first-person view (FPV) flying. See exactly what your drone sees and capture stunning aerial views using your mobile device.VR 3D Experience: Take your flights to the next level with the VR 3D experience. Use a compatible mobile app and VR glasses to immerse yourself in the world of drone flying.Extended Flight Time: The modular 3.7V 600mAh battery is easy to install and provides a generous flight time of up to 10 minutes. Plus, you can carry spare batteries for even longer adventures.Anti-Interference Technology: The drone operates on a 2.4GHz frequency with anti-interference technology, ensuring a stable and interference-free connection during flights.Dazzling LED Lights: Illuminate the skies with built-in LED lights that add a spectacular visual element to your night flights, making them even more exciting and mesmerizing.Unleash your inner pilot and capture stunning aerial footage with the F190 Mini RC Drone. Whether you're a photography enthusiast or simply looking for an exciting new hobby, this drone has everything you need to take flight. details.description_text: হাইলাইটস (Key Features):চার চাকার ফ্লাইট স্ট্যাবিলিটি (Four-axis stabilization)360° ফ্লিপ করার ক্ষমতাইউএসবি চার্জিং সাপোর্টহালকা ও সহজে বহনযোগ্যইনডোর ও আউটডোর ব্যবহারের উপযোগীবাচ্চাদের ও শিক্ষানবিশদের জন্য উপযুক্তদূর নিয়ন্ত্রিত (Remote Control) সিস্টেম---বক্সে যা যা থাকছে (What’s in the Box):১টি Mini Four-Axis Drone১টি রিমোট কন্ট্রোল (Remote Controller)১টি USB চার্জিং কেবলঅতিরিক্ত ৪টি প্রপেলার ব্লেড৪টি প্রটেকটিভ গার্ডইউজার ম্যানুয়াল (যদি থাকে)---Mini 4-Axis Remote Control Drone with 360° Flip – USB Charging, Indoor Flying Toy---বাংলা ডেসক্রিপশন (Product Description in Bengali)আপনার শিশুর বিনোদনে বা নিজের ড্রোন চালানোর অভিজ্ঞতা শুরু করতে চাইলে এই Mini 4-Axis Drone হতে পারে আপনার সেরা সঙ্গী। এটি একটি হালকা, ছোট আকারের এবং সহজে নিয়ন্ত্রণযোগ্য রিমোট কন্ট্রোল ড্রোন যা ঘরের ভেতরে এবং খোলা জায়গায় উড়ানো যায়।ড্রোনটিতে রয়েছে চারটি প্রপেলারে শক্তিশালী মোটর, যা এটিকে স্থিরভাবে আকাশে ভাসতে সাহায্য করে। এছাড়া রয়েছে 360 ডিগ্রি ফ্লিপ ফিচার যা একে আরও আকর্ষণীয় করে তোলে। এটি চার্জিং সুবিধাযুক্ত এবং ইউএসবি ক্যাবলের মাধ্যমে চার্জ দেওয়া যায়।ড্রোনটি বাচ্চাদের জন্য একদম উপযোগী এবং ১৪ বছরের উর্ধ্বে যে কেউ এটি চালাতে পারবে। এটি উপহার হিসেবে দিতে পারেন আপনার সন্তান, ভাই বা বন্ধুকে।---হাইলাইটস (Key Features):চার চাকার ফ্লাইট স্ট্যাবিলিটি (Four-axis stabilization)360° ফ্লিপ করার ক্ষমতাইউএসবি চার্জিং সাপোর্টহালকা ও সহজে বহনযোগ্যইনডোর ও আউটডোর ব্যবহারের উপযোগীবাচ্চাদের ও শিক্ষানবিশদের জন্য উপযুক্তদূর নিয়ন্ত্রিত (Remote Control) সিস্টেম---বক্সে যা যা থাকছে (What’s in the Box):১টি Mini Four-Axis Drone১টি রিমোট কন্ট্রোল (Remote Controller)১টি USB চার্জিং কেবলঅতিরিক্ত ৪টি প্রপেলার ব্লেড৪টি প্রটেকটিভ গার্ডইউজার ম্যানুয়াল (যদি থাকে)---Note: পণ্যের রঙ বা ডিজাইন ছবির সাথে কিছুটা ভিন্ন হতে পারে। ব্যবহারের সময় নিরাপত্তার বিষয়গুলো মাথায় রাখুন

Video and Audio Playback FormatsVideo Format: MP4Supported microSD CardsDoes not support storage expansion with an external SD cardThe DJI Neo Fly More Combo Drone provides a good balance of mobility and capability, making it a flexible choice for aerial enthusiasts. The drone is incredibly lightweight, weighing just about 135 grams, making it easy to pack and deploy. Despite its small size, the DJI Neo boasts outstanding imaging capabilities, including a 1/2-inch image sensor that provides high-resolution photographs and movies with increased clarity, especially in low-light circumstances. This makes it ideal for recording breathtaking views, family moments, or creative material from a birds-eye perspective. Stabilization is essential for airborne images, and the Neo comes with a single-axis mechanical gimbal with tilt control. This gimbal stabilizes the camera during flight, resulting in clear footage with minimal movement or blur, even as the drone moves. This function is very useful for users who wish to shoot dynamic video clips or keep image quality stable in windy circumstances. The DJI Neo, with an effective operating range of 50 meters, is designed for near to medium-range flights, making it suitable for recreational users looking to explore their surroundings or record moments from above. The Fly More Combo expands the experience with additional attachments like as extra batteries and propellers, allowing for longer flight times and less downtime between sessions. The drone's lightweight design also adds to its agility, allowing it to operate effectively in confined places or urban situations. The DJI Neo Fly More Combo Drone combines ease of operation, high-quality imagery, and stability in a small size, making it an excellent choice for novices, amateurs, and content creators looking for portable aerial photography.
